resources.string:
Welcome to the “MoneyMath” Privacy Policy

Last modified: December 13, 2019.

We do not collect any confidential information.

You can use “MoneyMath” at your own discretion.

Our Privacy Policy may change from time to time. We will not reduce your rights under this Privacy Policy without your explicit consent. We will post any privacy policy changes on this page by this link:

https://vmarch.github.io/privacy_policy_moneymath.html
And in this application while update.
